column3: تحياتي لكم حياتي هي الدراجات عشي حياتي كلها لحظة بلحظة مع الدراجات الدراجات هي من صغري بعمر 4سنوات الى 20 سنةو الى اخر يوم في حياتي الالهام للدراجات عشي 😢😢😢😢😢😢😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍اشكركم تحيا راكبي الدراجات🚴🚴🚴
Hey everybody, go do a group ride, but give us $200. Why is an unsupported, unmarshalled ride $200?What do you win? Seems like a scam.

Come on Rapha,  the social aspect part will always be there even if you don't use a Rapha Kit. other brands are as good as Rapha kits  as dont even need the video production aspect. Rapha would benefit  better if they show the real struggle a real cyclist goes through, Show the ROUGH, THE RAW, THE GRIND. as a matter any group ride thats not as Elitist would have the social aspect and experience without any brand name KITS.
Im confused! Can I ride gravel with a road bike?! lol
